#summary dateTimeSelect([dateOrder, timeOrder, dateSeparator, timeSeparator,separator])
#labels chapter,0.9.1

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing six select form controls (three for date selection and the remaining three for time selection).

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *dateOrder* || string || false || month,day,year || See documentation for `dateSelectTag` ||
|| *timeOrder* || string || false || hour,minute,second || See documentation for `timeSelectTag` ||
|| *dateSeparator* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `dateSelectTag ` ||
|| *timeSeparator* || string || false || : || See documentation for `timeSelectTag ` ||
|| *separator* || string || false || - || See documentation for `dateSelectTag` ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#dateTimeSelectTag()#</p>	
</cfoutput>
}}}
